/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Buildings of different architectural styles flank the street, their facades reflecting the city's rich history and modern development. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
